mapper.select: select * from NOTICES order by noticeDate DESC limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
SELECT count(*) FROM NOTICES WHERE noticeTitle LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%')
SELECT count(*) FROM NOTICES WHERE noticeContent LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%')
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICES SET NoticeCategory = #{noticeCategory}, NoticeTitle = #{noticeTitle}, NoticeContent = #{noticeContent}, NoticeDate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE NoticeId = #{noticeId}
mapper.insert: insert into NOTICES(NoticeCategory, NoticeTitle, NoticeContent, NoticeDate) values (#{noticeCategory}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
